result.execSummary:
The defendant Julio Antonio Truhler was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Julio Antonio Truhler is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Julio Antonio Truhler was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Julio Antonio Truhler was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
- Sign up for Probation on 07/26/22 by 12:00 PM. 

In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

miscConds.notes:
- $243.00 Court Costs, Payable through DOC as a condition of Probation on case 22CF82 count 1. 
- $200.00 DNA Surcharge, Payable through DOC as a condition of Probation on case 22CF82 count 1.

- DNA Sample
- Psychological/ Psychiatric Evaluation within 30 days if requested by Agent 
- Participate in MRT and complete successfully if requested by Agent 
- Participate in counseling if requested by Agent 
- Cooperate with any other evaluation, assessment and/or program as requested
- Prescribed medications only as prescribed 
- No possession or consumption of any illegal drugs including drug paraphernalia
- Defendant to have no one-on-one contact with any minor females under the age of 18 without supervision such as a parent and/or guardian and employment supervisor in a work setting. This does not apply to group functions such as school events or church events and through the course of employment 
- Maintain Full-time employment 
- Subject to random UA's and PBT's
- Follow rules and regulations of Agent and pay supervision fees

e: DOC arc

10:50 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Julio Antonio Truhler. Defendant Julio Antonio Truhler in court. Includes: 21CF338, 21CF350, 21CF423, 21CF655. 21TR1427, 21TR2022, and 22CF82. Court reviews case. recites resolution. Court questions Defendant. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands and pleads Guilty in case 21CF350 AMENDED Count 1: Misdemeanor Bail Jumping- 946.49(1)(a), 21CF423 AMENDED Count 1: Misdemeanor Bail Jumping- 946.49(1)(a), 21CF655 AMENDED Count 1: Misdemeanor Bail Jumping- 946.49(1)(a),  22CF82 AMENDED Count 1: Misdemeanor Bail Jumping- 946.49(1)(a), and 22CF82 Count 7: Disorderly Conduct- 947.01(1). Court finds that Defendant has freely and voluntarily entered plea and waived rights. Court accepts plea and finds sufficient facts. Court finds Defendant guilty. Upon motion of the State, Court dismisses 21CF338, 21CF350 Counts 2 and 3, 21CF423 Counts 2 and 3, 21CF655 Counts 2 and 3, 22CF82 Counts 2-6, 21TR1427 and 21TR2022. Sentencing arguments. 

Court Orders:

09:02 AM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Bela Alexander Ballo   DF ATTY:  Michelle M Erdman   DF:  Julio Antonio Truhler did not appear (appeared late). Hallway called. Set for Plea/Sentencing Hearing. Includes 21CF338, 21CF350, 21CF423, 21CF655, 21TR1427, 21TR2022, and 22CF82. Atty Erdman doesn't have any information regarding Defendant. Court will allow Atty Erdman to attempt to call Defendant. ADA Ballo requests warrant, but doesn't have an objection to staying a warrant. Court will issues warrant and STAY until 6/24/22 at 1:05 PM. Defendant must appear in person. Clerk's Office notifies DE called stating he will be 5 minutes late. Atty Erdman updates Court regarding Dunn Co matter and states it's set for sentencing. Court will give DE an opportunity to appear. Off record at 9:09 AM. Recalled at 9:18 AM. DF: Julio Antonio Truhler appeared. All other appearances as previously stated. Atty Erdman states cases are resolved. Court doesn't have enough time today for a felony plea and resets Plea/Sentencing Hearing IN PERSON. DE confirms address and phone number. Adjourned at 9:23 AM.  gll  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 26, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Inlcudes: 21CF338, 21CF350, 21CF423, 21CF655. 21TR1427, 21TR2022, and 22CF82. Court reviews case. Atty Erdman states Dunn Co sentencing got pushed out and another date is scheduled. ADA Ballo notes reports from JSC re: Defendant tampering with GPS unit. Court orders DE to report to JSC immediatly after adjournment. Court sets PLEAS. Court confirms address and phone number. Adjourned 11:11 AM  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on April 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Status conference on March 3, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

10:39 AM  Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: K. Anderson, ADA:  Erica Ellenwood, DE: Julio Antonio Truhler pro se. Court notes Atty. Erdman represents DE on other cases. Court sets status conference to check on attorney status, Zoom approved. Adjourned. kma  Status conference scheduled for March 3, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
By Patrick L - 22R 002155
Filed by DA's Office. km
Status conference on February 16, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Per SJN.  gll

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Madison E., her residence, or her place of employment. The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required to be fitted with a GPS monitoring device. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must report to the Justice Support Center immediately. If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

01:43 PM  CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood  DF ATTY:  Scott Selmer for today   DF:  Julio Antonio Truhler appeared from jail by video means. DE does qualify for PD-- Atty Erdman appointed on underlying file. Court advises of charges and possible penalties. Waive reading. Bond argument. Court orders bond. Court sets STC with Court Commissioner to see atty status and to set preliminary hearing. Court judicially transfers filed to Branch 2. Adjourned at 1:57 PM.  gll  Status conference scheduled for February 16, 2022 at 10:30 am.
